about.title: About Developer
about.subtitle: A developer who creates fun services using AI and web technologies

projectStory.title: How did this project start?
projectStory.content1: "Who does our child look more like?" - It started with a question that all parents wonder about at some point. I wanted to solve simple curiosity with AI technology and create a web service that families could use for fun.
projectStory.content2: During the development process, I tested various face recognition APIs and considered user experience to complete the current service. Seeing many families use it every day, I feel that technology can add fun to everyday life.

service.title: Facial Similarity Analysis with
service.subtitle: An innovative service that accurately analyzes facial similarity between two people through the latest facial recognition AI technology and provides objective numerical results.

aiTechnology.title: AI Facial Recognition Technology
aiTechnology.description: Utilizing InsightFace's latest Buffalo model to precisely extract and analyze key facial features.
features: Generation of high-dimensional facial embedding vectors

similarityCalculation.title: Accurate Similarity Calculation
similarityCalculation.description: Numerically calculates similarity between two faces by comparing extracted facial embedding vectors.
features: Accurate similarity measurement based on vector distance

step1.title: Upload Images
step1.description: Upload front-facing photos of parent and child respectively.

step2.title: AI Analysis
step2.description: InsightFace AI detects faces and extracts features.

step3.title: Calculate Similarity
step3.description: Compare facial embedding vectors to calculate similarity.

step4.title: Provide Results
step4.description: Provides overall similarity and confidence scores together.

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.description: Uploaded images are automatically deleted immediately after analysis completion and are not stored in any form.

speed.title: Fast Processing
speed.description: Quickly provides analysis results with optimized InsightFace model.

accuracy.title: High Accuracy
accuracy.description: InsightFace model trained on large-scale data provides highly accurate analysis results.
